name: A House of Thieves Demo
description:
Demo version of the indie-game: A House of Thieves, a level-based stealth comedy-horror game about a Thief who doesn't go shopping but instead takes his shopping list and breaks into random houses to get his things.

Imagine you want to cook some Pasta but you run out of Tomato Sauce. You are also not the kind of person who goes to a supermarket and pays for their groceries. What do you do?
Correct! Break into your neighbor's house and work through your shopping list!

PC version (mouse and keyboard) of the popular indie VR game There is a Thief in my House.

Excellent replayability
  • Items on your list are chosen at random
  • Items change their location every time you repeat a level

Localized
  • Play in English, German, Simplified Chinese, French, Spanish,
Accessibility
  • Enable subtitles (for the deaf / hard of hearing)
